metadata.description: DC Entertainment has been the birthplace of some of comics' landmark graphic novels, from books that defined the category like WATCHMEN, BATMAN: THE DARK KNIGHT RETURNS, and SANDMAN to contemporary classics like SUPERMAN: EARTH ONE and AMERICAN VAMPIRE. With DC COMICS ESSENTIALS, you can sample preview chapters from these best-selling titles as well as a guide to more essential DC Entertainment graphic novels.
metadata.name: DC Comics Essentials
